blog.name: ask-zen-okinaoto
blog.title: We are the Saviours.
blog.description: Archive blog currently. On hiatus due to irl events. Just free posting really?

summary: I have a lot of cool ideas for this blog, so while I wont be deleting all of my posts, i will be doing a simple restart...
body:
I have a lot of cool ideas for this blog, so while I wont be deleting all of my posts, i will be doing a simple restart scenario. Expect these to happen in the near future!:

- new characters (old ones will reappear ofc)

- structured plot and lore (based on asks and self posts)

- set timeline (Zen and others will be older now, adult age)

- perhaps some events

- attempt to interact with more blogs (PLEASE suggest some to me)

This will still be an ask blog, but I want it to be pretty laid back. I like creating stories and such for my OCs, so there will be some miscellaneous stuff too!

blog.name: bakugous-abs
blog.title: SHOOT STYLE
blog.description: Yo!! Patreon information can be found HERE!! Again, this isn't required for the blog, but it's an amazing way to support us further and get some amazing perks! ASK BOX FOR SCENARIOS AND HEADCANONS: CLOSED!!! ASK BOX FOR MATCHUPS: OPEN EVERYDAY!!! Current post Schedule: 2-3 posts from 5:00PM EST to 9:00PM EST!!!! BNHA blog here, ready to deliver some delightful scenarios, random posts I enjoy, and everything in between! Rules can be found HERE! If you have any questions, please go ahead and ask! MASTERLIST can be found HERE!!! ~ Admin HeroWeekly (OG), Admin Bomb, Admin Blue, Admin Eun, Admin Peaches, Admin Lyssa, and Admin Jorts!!!

summary: Jirou or Kirishima finding out their fem s/o has an eating disorder? Been struggling a little :(
question: Jirou or Kirishima finding out their fem s/o has an eating disorder? Been struggling a little :(
answer:
Hello friend. I’m so sorry to hear that you’re struggling with this right now. My box is always, and I mean always, open. One of us will be here to talk with you if you need it <3

~Admin HeroWeekly

Jirou

- Immediately concerned for you. She may not understand exactly what you’re going through at that moment, but Jirou is concerned for your health the instant she catches wind of it

- While wanting to help, she doesn’t want to make you uncomfortable

- Would try to gently bring up the topic

- Offers to help you through it, and learns as much as she can to better help you

- Jirou would be very, very clam about the whole situation and would try to find helpful way to assist you in overcoming it

- Is most concerned about your health, and will consistently make sure you’re taking care of yourself

- Even if she doesn’t say it outloud, Jirou is worried about you when she sees you struggling

- No matter what, though, she’s there to help you through it. Through hell and back, she’ll be there for you

Kirishima

- Isn’t really sure how to approach the problem

- He’d probably have to look up what you’re going through or ask someone, because Kirishima isn’t the most knowledgeable person

- When he realizes how serious it can be, he’s at your side in an instant

- While offering his help, Kirishima pulls you into a tight hug

- It hurts him to see you struggling with something like this

- Would try to help you with body-image and other potential triggers (depending on what yours are), but may not be able to help with the eating aspects

- He’s a foodie, but Kirishima would try his best to be respectful of you around that aspect

- All for all, he tries his best to simply be a moral support for you
